title: Camberwell Junction
brief_description: Made by Ivan Gaal, this film is in three parts. Still photographs of ‘past…definite’ are accompanied by sounds of horses hooves. ‘Present…indicative’ shows speeded up traffic during the day and night, making it difficult for people to cross the roads. ‘Future…indefinite’ poses a question mark.
